verbose_text: To identify proteins that associate with LOX-PP in breast cancer cells, GST tagged murine LOX-PP or control vector DNA (pEBG, encoding GST tag only) was expressed in ZR-75 cells for 24 h. Extracts were incubated with Glutathione-Sepharose 4B resin, and bound proteins washed extensively and eluted with SDS-PAGE loading buffer.
evidence: murine LOX-PP or control vector DNA (pEBG, encoding GST tag only) was expressed
